data.message: Facebook is improving alot.  I just think it's a shame that there is a bit too much adult content advertised.  Perhaps kids (under18) should not be allowed Facebook accounts and there are ways to ensure this! Just a suggestion! I love Facebook otherwise ♥

replies.message: Thanks for all the feedback, Lindy! Though people are in control of what they see on Facebook, we do remove things that don't follow the Facebook Terms, such as bullying or graphic violence. If you're seeing this material on Facebook, please report it to us here: http://on.fb.me/1dmSfHK. We appreciate you helping us make Facebook a safer place! -Rose
